00021 inline Cell* make_int(int i)
00022 {
00023   Cell* my_cell = new Cell();
00024   my_cell->tag_m = type_int;
00025   my_cell->int_m = i;
00026   return my_cell;
00027 }

00045 inline Cell* make_symbol(const char* s)
00046 {
00047   Cell* my_cell = new Cell();
00048   my_cell->tag_m = type_symbol;
00049   my_cell->symbol_m = new char[strlen(s)+1];
00050   strcpy(my_cell->symbol_m,s);
00051   return my_cell;
00052 }

00061 {
00062   return new Node(my_elem, my_next);

00069 inline bool intp(const Cell* c)
00070 {
00071   return c ? c->tag_m == type_int : false;
00072 }
00073 
00078 inline bool doublep(const Cell* c)
00079 {
00080   return c ?  c->tag_m == type_double : false;
00081 }
00082 
00087 inline bool symbolp(const Cell* c)
00088 {
00089   return c ? c->tag_m == type_symbol : false;
00090 }

00096 inline int get_int(const Cell* c)
00097 {
00098   if (intp(c)){
00099     return c->int_m;
00100   } else {
00101     //print out error
00102     std::cerr << "ERROR" <<std::endl;
00103     exit(1);
00104   }
00105 }

00142 inline Cell* get_elem(const Node* n)
00143 {
00144   //make sure passed in n points to a valid Node*
00145   return n ? n->elem_m : (Cell*)NULL;
00146 }
00147 
00152 inline Node* get_next(const Node* n)
00153 {
00154   return n ? n->next_m : (Node*)NULL;
00155 }

00162 inline std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const Node& n)
00163 {
00164   const Node* p = &n;
00165   //print the opening paren
00166   os << "(";
00167 
00168   //an "infinite loop" printing each node
00169   //break upon end
00170   while(p) {
00171     
00172     if (intp(get_elem(p))) {
00173       os<<get_int(get_elem(p));
00174     } else if (doublep(get_elem(p))){
00175       os<<get_double(get_elem(p));
00176     } else if (symbolp(get_elem(p))){
00177       os<<get_symbol(get_elem(p));
00178     }
00179     
00180     //move to the next node if exsits
00181     //otherwise break the loop
00182     if (get_next(p)) {
00183       //remeber to print a space
00184       os << " ";
00185       p = get_next(p);
00186     } else break;
00187   }
00188 
00189   //print the closing paren
00190   os << ")";
00191   
00192   return os;
00193 }
